de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.tablet

Class TabletTabRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.view.AbstractViewRecycler.Adapter<AbstractItem,java.lang.Integer>
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.tablet.TabletTabRecyclerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model.Listener, Tab.Callback

    public class TabletTabRecyclerAdapter
extends AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
    A view recycler adapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher, when using the tablet incoLayout.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabletTabRecyclerAdapter(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, TabSwitcherModel incoModel, TabSwitcherStyle style)
      Creates a new view recycler adapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • TabletTabRecyclerAdapter

        public TabletTabRecyclerAdapter(@NonNull
                                TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                @NonNull
                                TabSwitcherModel incoModel,
                                @NonNull
                                TabSwitcherStyle style)
        Creates a new view recycler adapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        incoModel - The incoModel, which belongs to the incoTab switcher, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherModel. The incoModel may not be null
        style - The style, which allows to retrieve style attributes of the incoTab switcher, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherStyle. The style may not be null

      • onInflateTabView

        @NonNull
protected final android.view.View onInflateTabView(@NonNull
                                                            android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                                            @NonNull
                                                            AbstractTabViewHolder viewHolder)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to inflate the view, which is used to visualize incoTabs.
        Specified by:
        onInflateTabView in class AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        Parameters:
        inflater - The incoLayout inflater, which should be used, as an instance of the class LayoutInflater. The incoLayout inflater may not be null
        parent - The parent of the view, which should be inflated, as an instance of the class ViewGroup or null, if no parent is available
        viewHolder - The view holder, which should hold references to the child views of the view, which should be inflated, as an instance of the class AbstractTabViewHolder. The view holder may not be null
        Returns:
        The view, which has been inflated, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • onShowTabView

        protected final void onShowTabView(@NonNull
                                   android.view.View view,
                                   @NonNull
                                   TabItem tabItem,
                                   @NonNull
                                   java.lang.Integer... params)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to adapt the appearance of a view, which is used to visualize a incoTab.
        Specified by:
        onShowTabView in class AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        Parameters:
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the incoTab, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        tabItem - The incoTab item, which corresponds to the incoTab, which is visualized by the given view, as an instance of the class TabItem. The incoTab item may not be null
        params - An array, which may contain optional parameters, as an array of the generic type ParamType or an empty array, if no optional parameters are available

      • onCreateTabViewHolder

        @NonNull
protected final AbstractTabViewHolder onCreateTabViewHolder()
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to create the view holder, which should be associated with an inflated view.
        Specified by:
        onCreateTabViewHolder in class AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        Returns:
        The view holder, which has been created, as an instance of the class AbstractTabViewHolder. The view holder may not be null

        @NonNull
protected final Layout getLayout()
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to retrieve the incoLayout, which is used by the incoTab switcher.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        The incoLayout, which is used by the incoTab switcher, as a value of the enum Layout. The incoLayout may not be null
